China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 19 日星期二 07:32:18 GMT 120
Many hospitals in China stop newborn delivery services as birth rate dropsMany hospitals in China have stopped offering newborn delivery services this year, state-backed news outlet Daily Economic News reported, with industry experts warning of an "obstetric winter" due to declining demand amid a record drop in new births. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 07:00:21 GMT IQM4DCAMENMR7EEQ5KZRK7JX3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/china/many-hospitals-china-stop-newborn-delivery-services-birth-rate-drops-2024-03-19/Reuters世界中国
Killing of teen in China puts 'left behind' children of migrant workers in spotlightThe killing of a 13-year old boy in northern China last week, for which three boys are in police custody, has triggered a heated discussion in the media on juvenile crime and the plight of children left at home by migrant workers. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:52:15 GMT 2OOWIMH4XNIA5B4RCQ44ECPDUU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/killing-teen-china-puts-left-behind-children-migrant-workers-spotlight-2024-03-19/Bernard Orr, Laurie Chen世界中国
Chinese developer Vanke's credit pursuit clouded by clamour for collateralA rare Beijing directive to help Vanke beat a liquidity crisis has left lenders scrabbling for the assets that the state-backed developer has proposed for collateral, as parties pull out all the stops to arrest deterioration in the property sector. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:25:04 GMT L4MEBEDXYZOWXLAKH3UP27DC5E https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinese-developer-vankes-credit-pursuit-clouded-by-clamour-collat​​eral-2024-03-19/Engen Tham, Ziyi Tang, Clare Jim市场亚洲市场
Philippines sees up to $6 bln of investments in casino sector in next 5 yearsForeign and domestic firms are expected to invest much as $6 billion in the Philippines' casino sector in the next five years, the head of its gaming regulator said, bolstering its status among Asia's top gambling destinations as competition increases. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:10:44 GMT FYS5I4TVSJN33OIJY6FION36XY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-sees-up-6-bln-investments-casino-sector-next-5-years-2024-03-19/Neil Morales世界亚太地区
Philippines foreign minister says challenge is how to sustain, elevate US-Philippines allianceThe Philippines' foreign minister said on Tuesday the challenge ahead was how to sustain and further elevate relations between his country and long-term ally, the United States. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 06:02:37 GMT 54XRH5PL7NNSVEMULWSHQ2WPXI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-foreign-minister-says-challenge-is-how-sustain-elevate-us-2024-03-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
China seen leaving benchmark lending rates unchanged in MarchChina is widely expected to leave benchmark lending rates unchanged on Wednesday, a Reuters survey showed, as the central bank kept a key policy rate steady last week at a time when the broad economy is starting to show some signs of improvement. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 05:27:28 GMT BXA6JBEGO5KZHKB7MZ47KNNCD4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/rates-bonds/china-seen-leaving-benchmark-lending-rates-unchanged-march-2024-03-19/Reuters市场利率与债券
